Articles.Content:
one day got bored and i created a fully functional saturn v replica, it can fly really well, it has 3 stages, the first two get you really high and the third takes you to orbit and to the moon,minmus and even can escape kerbin, i haven't tested if it can reach kerbin's closest neighbors but it flies like a charm

----SATURN V----

MOD LIST:Kw,stretchy tanks,AIES,engineer redux

the next version im working on will have less mods dependant

Mods to be deleted in next update:AIES,engineer redux

Download: https://mega.co.nz/#!dpdjQIQL!W6YG-Wf36s6shlG9JLde0jpJI0UXItrbzgP9LkOpZTw

----SATURN I----

Coming soon

having problems with the first stage being too underpowered

----SATURN IB----

Coming soon

having problems with the first stage being too underpowered

---SLS----

Coming really really soon, right here you can see the second stage, i think it from SLS block I or II where the second, or third stage counting the SRB's has 2 engines, it can reach the mun and minmus esaily, its easier to fly than the Saturn V, the example lander and ship are not included C:

this is just the second, i mean third stage,

an orion like CM aproaches a typical lander for docking
